com.sinch.android.rtc.messaging

Interface MessageClient


  • public interface MessageClient
    The MessageClient provides the entry point to the messaging functionality of the Sinch SDK. A MessageClient can be acquired via the SinchClient.

    Example

     

 sinchClient.setSupportMessaging(true);
 sinchClient.start();

 ...

 // Get the MessageClient from the SinchClient
 MessageClient messageClient = sinchClient.getMessageClient();
 messageClient.addMessageClientListener(...);


 // Create a WritableMessage
 WritableMessage message = new WritableMessage(
 			"someRecipientUserId",
 			"Hello someRecipientUserId! How are you?");

 // Send it
 messageClient.send(message);

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMessageClientListener(MessageClientListener messageClientListener)
      The MessageClientListener object handles events from the MessageClient, such as incoming messages.
      void removeMessageClientListener(MessageClientListener messageClientListener)
      Remove listener for message events.
      void send(WritableMessage message)
      Sends the message to the user specified in the WritableMessage.
      Note: Do not send the same WritableMessage object more than once.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(WritableMessage message)
        Sends the message to the user specified in the WritableMessage.
        Note: Do not send the same WritableMessage object more than once.
        Parameters:
        message - An object that contains data about a message, e.g. text body and recipient. May not be null and must have a text body and a recipient.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the WritableMessage doesn't validate.

      • addMessageClientListener

        void addMessageClientListener(MessageClientListener messageClientListener)
        The MessageClientListener object handles events from the MessageClient, such as incoming messages.
        Parameters:
        messageClientListener - a MessageClientListener

      • removeMessageClientListener

        void removeMessageClientListener(MessageClientListener messageClientListener)
        Remove listener for message events.
        Parameters:
        messageClientListener - a MessageClientListener
